mapper.sql: id, user_id, real_name, identity_no, bank_name, bank_name_code, bank_account, province, province_code, city, city_code, address, loan_limit, loan_month, education, education_code, loan_usage, loan_usage_code, sesame_score, particle_loan, jd_white_note, ant_spend, occupation, occupation_code, work_month, social_security, accumulation_fund, commercial_insurance, house_assets, vehicle_assets, monthly_income, monthly_income_code, salary_payment, credit_situation, credit_card_amount, marital_status, marital_status_code, email, company, company_province, company_city, company_address, company_industry, company_industry_code, company_tel, `position`, position_code, loan_amount, loan_period, loan_method, del_flag, created_date, created_by, updated_date, updated_by
mapper.select:
select
from t_cust_user_profile where user_id = #{userId} and del_flag = 0

select tcup.user_id userId, tcup.real_name realName, tcup.identity_no identityNo, tcu.account mobile, tcup.bank_name bankName, tcup.bank_name_code bankNameCode, tcup.bank_account bankAccount, tcup.loan_amount loanAmount, tcup.loan_period loanPeriod, tcup.loan_method loanMethod, tcup.province, tcup.province_code provinceCode, tcup.city, tcup.city_code cityCode, tcup.address address, tcup.loan_limit loanLimit, tcup.loan_month loanMonth, tcup.education, tcup.education_code educationCode, tcup.loan_usage loanUsage, tcup.loan_usage_code loanUsageCode, tcup.sesame_score sesameScore, tcup.particle_loan particleLoan, tcup.jd_white_note jdWhiteNote, tcup.ant_spend antSpend, tcup.occupation, tcup.occupation_code occupationCode, tcup.work_month workMonth, tcup.social_security socialSecurity, tcup.accumulation_fund accumulationFund, tcup.commercial_insurance commercialInsurance, tcup.house_assets houseAssets, tcup.vehicle_assets vehicleAssets, tcup.monthly_income monthlyIncome, tcup.monthly_income_code monthlyIncomeCode, tcup.salary_payment salaryPayment, tcup.credit_situation creditSituation, tcup.credit_card_amount creditCardAmount, tcup.created_date createdDate from t_cust_user_profile tcup left join t_cust_user tcu on tcu.id = tcup.user_id where 1=1
and (tcu.account like CONCAT('%',#{term},'%') or tcup.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{term},'%'))
order by tcup.created_date desc

select tcup.user_id userId, tcup.real_name realName, tcup.identity_no identityNo, tcu.account mobile, tcup.bank_name bankName, tcup.bank_name_code bankNameCode, tcup.bank_account bankAccount, tcup.loan_amount loanAmount, tcup.loan_period loanPeriod, tcup.loan_method loanMethod, tcup.province, tcup.province_code provinceCode, tcup.city, tcup.city_code cityCode, tcup.address address, tcup.loan_limit loanLimit, tcup.loan_month loanMonth, tcup.education, tcup.education_code educationCode, tcup.loan_usage loanUsage, tcup.loan_usage_code loanUsageCode, tcup.sesame_score sesameScore, tcup.particle_loan particleLoan, tcup.jd_white_note jdWhiteNote, tcup.ant_spend antSpend, tcup.occupation, tcup.occupation_code occupationCode, tcup.work_month workMonth, tcup.social_security socialSecurity, tcup.accumulation_fund accumulationFund, tcup.commercial_insurance commercialInsurance, tcup.house_assets houseAssets, tcup.vehicle_assets vehicleAssets, tcup.monthly_income monthlyIncome, tcup.monthly_income_code monthlyIncomeCode, tcup.salary_payment salaryPayment, tcup.credit_situation creditSituation, tcup.credit_card_amount creditCardAmount, tcup.created_date createdDate from t_cust_user_profile tcup left join t_cust_user tcu on tcu.id = tcup.user_id where 1=1
and (tcu.account like CONCAT('%',#{term},'%') or tcup.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{term},'%'))
order by tcup.created_date desc
